content: combining aqua blue and off-white the sweater is knitted seamlessly from the neckline to the hem and cuffs this is a lovely mother-daughter project the matching adult pattern is tiiraluoto sweater 1 **yarn required** to complete the sweater you ll need novita nordic wool 116 aqua 200 250 300 350 400 g 010 off white 50 50 50 50 50 g **languages** the pattern is also available in finnish https //novita com/patterns/pieni-tiiraluoto-neulepusero in swedish https //novita com/sv/patterns/liten-tirklackstroja 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/tiiraluoto-sweater
